scripts.quickdapp-build: cd contracts && forge build && cd .. && next build
scripts.quickdapp-test: cd contracts && forge test && cd .. && next lint
scripts.quickdapp-dev: cd contracts && forge compile && cd .. && next dev --turbopack
scripts.quickdapp-clean: cd contracts && forge clean && cd .. && rm -rf .next out
scripts.quickdapp-start: cd contracts && forge install --no-commit && forge build && cd .. && next build && next start
